title: Operation response payload validation of definition <org.eclipse.ditto:HonoCommissioning:1.0.0> for message subject (operation name) <commission>
description: Perform commissioning of new device to enable device connectivity via Eclipse Hono. Please note that the Eclipse Hono 'device-id' and 'auth-id' are derived from the thing-id used in Eclipse Ditto.

code.description: Status code according to HTTP status code information; see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-6
